ru.mobicomk.mfradio.model
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  ru.mobicomk.mfradio.model.Model

public class Model
extends java.lang.Object

Application data model class

Model containts station playlist, volume level information and locale for the Player

Author:
Roman Bondarenko, Alexey Rybalko
See Also:
UIController

addStationInfo

public void addStationInfo(StationInfo si)
Add station at tail of the play list. This method fire Playlist Changes notification of the ModelListener interface.

Parameters:
si - New station information.

deleteStationInfo

public void deleteStationInfo(int idx)
Remove station information from playlist. Find station by position. This method fire Playlist Changes notification of the ModelListener interface.

Parameters:
idx - Index of the station in playlist.
